name: Slingshot (Mylzzzz)
description:
An interactive rock shooter game where you only have 1 stone to kill all the birds.

This game is heavily inspired by the YouTuber Polymars and his video with barji where they had a GameJam with $1000 on the line. The game is a slingshot game with only 1 stone per level.

The goal is to kill all the birds with only 1 stone. With levels that are intentionally designed with puzzle-like mechanics
